item.title: How to Manage Work & Personal Git Accounts on One Machine
item.description: Learn how to configure your local machine to use different Git user details and SSH keys for your work and personal projects. No more mixed identities!

item.title: Rewriting History
item.description: Sometimes files get committed to Git that shouldn’t be. We all do it. This post will cover a process on how to remove the mistake without losing the entire repository history.
